nodes.text: Glimmet Ledd was a member of the Luurian Genetic Enclave and served in the Republic Ministry of Science to the Clone Wars.
On 14:3:2, Ledd was quoted in the Ministry's report on the response to the Confederacy of Independent Systems' swamp gas.
Glimmet Ledd appears in the HoloNet News edition in Star Wars Insider 66.
